name: Coffee Break (itch) (Benji)
description:
small game all you do is collect coffee to stay awake.

you can also collect coins...

made in under 24 hours and i probably wont ever come back to this again.

.

.

.

Models made in blender, Art made using sketch book Pro, Game Made using Unreal Engine, music found online for free use, Sound Effects made using SFXR.

everything but music is made by BenjiDev.
